subject: Hunting and Trapping
Environment
Ethics
lead_paragraph: His name is Hack Albertson, but he is also called the Machine. He boasts about his ability to bag bucks. And what does he think of Michael Kernen, his opponent in a competition sponsored by the fledgling World Hunting Association?.
snippet: His name is Hack Albertson, but he is also called the Machine. He boasts about his ability to bag bucks. And what does he think of Michael Kernen, his opponent in a competition sponsored by the fledgling World Hunting Association?.
